name: Chocolate Brownie Pudding Cups
description: Indulge your inner dessert diva with these delightful sweets. This recipe is all about presentation, to ensure every layer shines, prep your brownies and pudding in advance, grating you ample time to put together these layered delights. Or, prep all the servings ahead of time and chill in the fridge until it’s time to serve!

ingredients.name: each vanilla Greek yogurt and whipped cream

preparation: Cut brownies into 12 squares. Place in 12 stemless wine glasses.
In a bowl, fold yogurt and whipped cream together.
Spoon over pudding and top with berries.

products.name: Fudgy Brownie Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: We’ll let you in on a little secret: You can make the fudgiest, chocolatiest brownies ever in the microwave in just 4 minutes (or 20 minutes in the oven)! Just add a few simple ingredients to our gluten free batter and let the magic unfold in your Multipurpose Steamer. When ready, slice ‘em up any way you like – on their own, topped with ice cream or icing, in a sundae, or as a dessert base.

products.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Spoon after delicious spoon, satisfy your sweet tooth with a low-calorie chocolate pudding that’s decadent and oh-so-good.
